title: Asha Dandu
description: Recruiter, Product Manager, Hobbyist and now Blogger :)

home.title: Hi! I'm Delog
home.description:
Hey there ! Thank you for stopping by.\
I'm a recruiter/head hunter by profession and help various clients hire the best talent. I'm a curious soul who enjoys learning about new trends in the market and software products that offer solutions to simple everyday problems. My current interest revolves around software project management, product life cycle, product branding, strategy, marketing, and monetization.
